titles.title: A joint resolution to congratulate the skipper and crew of the STARS & STRIPES on their victory in the 1987 America's Cup yachting competition.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Referred to Subcommittee on Census and Population.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 2/4/1987--Introduced. Authorizes and requests the President to congratulate Dennis Conner and the crew of the yacht Stars and Stripes on their 1987 America's Cup victory.
